metadata.comments: This playbook will collect sentinel incident evidence (aka 'Events') and send them and the alerts to EventHub. 3rd party SIEM can connect to the above EventHub and save this data to farther analysis.
metadata.author: Yaniv Shasha

body.ContentData:
@{base64(concat('"{','
','"Alert Display Name": "',triggerBody()?['AlertDisplayName'],'",','
','"Alert URI":"',triggerBody()?['AlertUri'],'",','
','"Product Name":"',triggerBody()?['ProductName'],'",','
','"AlertEntites":"',triggerBody()?['Entities'],'",','
','"AlertsDescription": "',triggerBody()?['Description'],'",','
','"Product Name":"',triggerBody()?['ProductName'],',','
','"Severity":"',triggerBody()?['Severity'],'",','
','"System Alert Id":"',triggerBody()?['SystemAlertId'],'",','
','"Alert Time":"',triggerBody()?['TimeGenerated'],',','
','"Resource Group":"',triggerBody()?['WorkspaceResourceGroup'],'",','
','"Subscription Id":"',triggerBody()?['WorkspaceSubscriptionId'],'",','
','"Alert type":"',triggerBody()?['AlertType'],'",','
','"Extended Properties":"',triggerBody()?['ExtendedProperties'],'",','
','"Provider Alert ID":"',triggerBody()?['ProviderAlertId'],'",','
','"Alert Start Time":"',triggerBody()?['StartTimeUtc'],'",','
','"Alert End time":"',triggerBody()?['EndTimeUtc'],'",','
','"Events":"',json(string(body('Parse_JSON_3'))),'",','
','}"','
','
','
'))}
